code: import{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[region,setRegion]=useState("USA");const[timing,setTiming]=useState("");const getServiceTiming=()=>{fetch("https://your-render-backend.onrender.com/api/service-timing?region=".concat(region)).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setTiming(data.timing||"5-10 minutes")).catch(err=>{console.error(err);setTiming("5-10 minutes");});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"AI Hospitality Assistant"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:region,onChange:e=>setRegion(e.target.value),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Europe",children:"Europe"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"USA",children:"USA"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Caribbean",children:"Caribbean"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Asia",children:"Asia"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:getServiceTiming,children:"Get Service Timing"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Recommended Timing: ",timing||"Press button to get timing"]})]});}export default App;
